document.full_text: tajikistan should engage with non-violent islamic groups to avoid sliding toward conflict with a new generation of home-grown insurgents and fighters crossing back from afghanistan, the international crisis group said.
document.title: tajikistan at growing risk of insurgency: report
lines_and_colors: tajikistan should engage with non-violent islamic groups to avoid sliding toward conflict with a new generation of home-grown insurgents and fighters crossing back from afghanistan, the international crisis group said.
